messages.subject: oops
messages.msgSnippet: I meant to say I appreciate ALL of you.  Not BOTH of you. Back to lurking Cherry
messages.messageBody:
I meant to say I appreciate ALL of you. Not BOTH of you.

Back to lurking
Cherry

messages.subject: oops
messages.msgSnippet: opppppp, can you say ~ SPELL CHECK  who z going to correct her typos if it s the last thing she does :{ WARNING: I cannot be help
messages.messageBody:
opppppp, can you say ~> SPELL CHECK <~, Pris???

Pris ~> who'z going to correct her typos if it's the last thing she does :{
WARNING: I cannot be help responsible for the above, as apparently my cats
have learned how to type ...

----- Original Message -----
From: "Pris" <x_t_sipr@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 05, 2000 7:52 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Weather, cold summers


> >
> *YES*, dh and boys DID FIND YOU :) hehe ... okkkk, when can we come for
our
> VISIT??? just JOKING!!!
> I'll be sure to tell dh about the antique train museum, how neat ... last
> summer we took the Silverton/Durang train in CO, we had a BLAST ... dh
> begged and begged the engineer to let him run the train (course, he
couldn't
> and dh KNEW BETTER!!!) but after showing his rr id card, the eng let dh
get
> on the train for a few mintes ... this was the highlight of his
vacation!!!
>
> Pris
> WARNING: I cannot be help responsible for the above, as apparently my cats
> have learned how to type ...
>

messages.subject: oops
messages.msgSnippet: i m sorry for the multiple postings. i hit cancel when i saw i made a blunder on the first post, but it went through anyway.
messages.messageBody:
i'm sorry for the multiple postings.
i hit cancel when i saw i made a blunder on the first post,
but it went through anyway.
